changelog.changes:
* Incognito mode implemented
* Settings: added option to keep screen always on (thank you  Sebastian Niemann for pull request !)
* German translation (thank you peat80 for pull request !)
* Fixed problem with voice recognition on android >= 11 (now look a bit changed but functionality recovered)
* Icon look changed to declare support for Ukraine (explanation by link in settings)

* Added ability to set search engine as homepage (thank you E-D-W-I-N for pull request !)
* Dark theme tuning/fixing/backporting; should now work on pre-Android 10 devices
* Improvement: auto retry download, this helps on some sites
* Fix: crash on download on Fire TV (thank you tsynik for crashlog)
* Fix: unability to select tab with mouse (thank you xvkong for foundings)
* Fix for not showing ssl errors on some pages
* Fix for tabs fast scrolling issues
